abstract: InBev said on Monday that the U.S. Department of Justice was seeking additional information about its $52 billion deal for U.S. brewer Anheuser-Busch.
snippet: InBev said on Monday that the U.S. Department of Justice was seeking additional information about its $52 billion deal for U.S. brewer Anheuser-Busch.
lead_paragraph: InBev said on Monday that the U.S. Department of Justice was seeking additional information about its $52 billion deal for U.S. brewer Anheuser-Busch.

headline.main: Justice Dept. Requests More Information on Anheuser Deal
